Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago and 71st, due to street blockage near 71st/St. Lawrence.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Cicero.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
